name: Cosmic Critters
description:
Survive until you can escape :^)

Made quickly in 72 hours!!!! (￣ω￣)

Very crude but it is something!!!!! 

Tips:

  • Lock doors and vents to prevent things from getting into your room.
  • Space suit guy is slow and will kill you.
  • There is a small spider that will crawl through vents... and make the space guy kill you (*￣▽￣)
  • Cat will eat your hamster but not kill you. Without your hamster you can't lock the others out. (✧ω✧)
